description:
Position: Senior or Lead Data Scientist with Supply Chain and Forecasting Experience in Retail Chain

Location: TN. 100% Remote. CST Time Zone

Key Skills: Machine Learning, Statistical Analysis, Python, Pyspark, Tensorflow, Keras, MLOps, GCP (Vertex AI, Kubeflow), Java microservices, Forecasting, Supply Chain

Description
• 10+ years of total experience out of which 3+ years of experience providing technical and architectural guidance in a technical lead or architect role.
• Technical expertise in machine learning, deep learning, statistical analysis, and software development.
• Proficient in data mining, machine learning, and deep learning packages in Python/Tensorflow/Keras.
• Experience working with large data sets and cloud computing (Hive, Spark, GCP, or Azure).
• Proficient in coding SQL, Python, Java, or Javascript.
• - Advanced degree (Master or PhD) in any STEM field plus 10+ years of related experience.
• PhD Candidates who are research oriented and have published patents, papers, journals, articles, blog on Data Science are preferred.
• A proven track record of leading innovation such as Medium Blog, patents, or conference presentation is preferred.
• Experience in MLOps is a plus.
• Experience with GCP services like Vertex AI and Kubeflow are desirable but not required.
• Exposure to core Java, spring suite of products, complex microservice integration design patterns, messaging and pub sub frameworks is a plus.
• PySpark knowledge
• Supply chain experience
• Forecasting experience
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, iterative development environment.
• Good communication skills, ability to work with cross-functional teams of technical and non-technical associates
